about_the_game: Demo version is fully functional however you are limited to level 20 in all skills. The skills are Combat, Mining, Woodcutting, Plains Mastery, Forest Mastery, and Mountain Mastery. Only the first few resources and zones are available.
detailed_description: Demo version is fully functional however you are limited to level 20 in all skills. The skills are Combat, Mining, Woodcutting, Plains Mastery, Forest Mastery, and Mountain Mastery. Only the first few resources and zones are available.
name: DarkSpar Demo
